alert.note: Alert for Anne Arundel; Calvert; St. Marys (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 10 at 6:25PM EDT until August 10 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM EDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL ANNE ARUNDEL...NORTH CENTRAL ST. MARYS AND CALVERT COUNTIES... At 624 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Dunkirk to Golden Beach, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damaging winds will cause some trees and large branches to fall. This could injure those outdoors, as well as damage homes and vehicles. Roadways may become blocked by downed trees. Localized power outages are possible. Unsecured light objects may become projectiles. Locations impacted include... Shady Side, Chesapeake Beach, Deale, Prince Frederick, Sheridan Point, Hallowing Point, Breezy Point, Golden Beach, Dunkirk, Saint Leonard, Huntingtown, Owings, Long Beach, Aquasco, Calvert Beach, Friendship, Port Republic, Sandgates, Sunderland and Mount Harmony. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
